channel.title: I hate Timmy
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I hate Timmy"

item.title: Re: I hate Timmy
item.content:encoded: I got Timmy on my first try with Shorty and Tatsâ€¦. Figures I get timmy in one try and MC in 35

item.title: Re: I hate Timmy
item.content:encoded: I just managed to level Timmy up. I did it with Tats and MC Stripeypants filling up the rest of my party. I'm not sure if MC helps for leveling him up, but it only took me 3 tries.

item.title: Re: I hate Timmy
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, that's when I first tried to level up Timmy. It's ungodly painful at that point.

Hermano+Shorty+Timmy+Shikai helps a lot. If you don't have Hermano, Tats will do.

item.title: Re: I hate Timmy
item.content:encoded: I'm in the middle of getting my sword. I may just wait until that happens and I get tats before trying this anymore. Thanks for the tip.

item.title: Re: I hate Timmy
item.content:encoded:
That mission was a real pain for me when I first attempted it. Do you already have Tats? Once you've gotten Tats it gets infinitely easier.

And trust me, I'm sympathetic. I did the Destroy a Hollow Strong hold 7 times today with MC Stripeypants in my group, not a single Hollow Jaw dropped. That makes 3 days in a row without seeing a Jaw. Five days just trying to get Jaws. Probably a week and a half when you count time spent collecting Tasty Burgers.

item.title: I hate Timmy
item.content:encoded: I wasted all of my stamina today trying to get Timmy lvl 2. He failed to level up 6!!!!! times! Not counting the number of times I failed trying to complete the mission. I hate Timmy.
